info.title: Fotolia
info.description: Fotoliau2019s industry-leading API allows developers and businesses to quickly integrate a vast database of images in their workflows and business models.

get.summary: This method returns childs of a parent category in fotolia representative category system. This method could be used to display a part of the category system or the all tree. Fotolia categories system counts three levels.
get.description: This method returns childs of a parent category in fotolia representative category system. This method could be used to display a part of the category system or the all tree. Fotolia categories system counts three levels.

get.summary: This method returns childs of a parent category in fotolia conceptual category system. This method could be used to display a part of the category system or the all tree. Fotolia categories system counts three levels.
get.description: This method returns childs of a parent category in fotolia conceptual category system. This method could be used to display a part of the category system or the all tree. Fotolia categories system counts three levels.

get.summary: This method returns Fotolia list of countries.
get.description: This method returns Fotolia list of countries.

get.summary: This methods returns public galleries for a defined language
get.description: This methods returns public galleries for a defined language

get.summary: This methods makes possible to search media in fotolia image bank. Full search capabilities are available through the API.
get.description: This methods makes possible to search media in fotolia image bank. Full search capabilities are available through the API.

parameters.name: search_parameters[cat1_id]
parameters.description: Search by representative category  get valid categories1 ids width getCategories1

parameters.name: search_parameters[cat2_id]
parameters.description: Search by conceptual category   get valid valid category2 ids width getCategories2

parameters.name: search_parameters[country_id]
parameters.description: Search by country  get valid country ids  with getCountries

parameters.name: search_parameters[detail_level]
parameters.description: When this parameter is sent and set to 1, the method will return for each content :               nb_downloads        nb_views

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][age]
parameters.description: only images 1 week old           only images 1 month old           only images 6 months old           only images 1 year old           only images 2 year old           all images (default)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][colors]
parameters.description: comma separated listed of hexadecimal colors (without any # prefix)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][orientation]
parameters.description: only horizontal image           only vertical image           all images (default)

parameters.name: search_parameters[filters][video_duration]
parameters.description: 0 - 10 seconds           10 - 20 seconds           20 - 30 seconds           more than 30 seconds           all videos (default)

parameters.name: search_parameters[gallery_id]
parameters.description: Search by gallery  get valid galleries ids with getGalleries

parameters.name: search_parameters[order]
parameters.description: Relevance            price ASC            creation date DESC            number of views DESC            number of downloads DESC

parameters.name: search_parameters[words]
parameters.description: keyword search  words can also be media_id using # to search for some media ( ex : #20 #21 #22)

get.summary: This method returns most searched tag and most used tag on fotolia website. This method may help you to create a tags cloud.

shoppingcart.add.summary: This methods allows you to add one or more files into the shopping cart.
shoppingcart.add.description: This methods allows you to add one or more files into the shopping cart.

shoppingcart.clear.summary: This methods allows you to empty the shopping cart.
shoppingcart.clear.description: This methods allows you to empty the shopping cart.

shoppingcart.getList.summary: This methods allows you to retrieve the shopping cart from your account.
shoppingcart.getList.description: This methods allows you to retrieve the shopping cart from your account.

shoppingcart.remove.summary: This methods allows you to remove one or more files from the shopping cart.
shoppingcart.remove.description: This methods allows you to remove one or more files from the shopping cart.

shoppingcart.transferToLightbox.summary: This methods allows you to transfer one or more files from the shopping cart to the user's default lightbox.
shoppingcart.transferToLightbox.description: This methods allows you to transfer one or more files from the shopping cart to the user's default lightbox.

shoppingcart.update.summary: This methods allows you to update one or more files into the shopping cart.
shoppingcart.update.description: This methods allows you to update one or more files into the shopping cart.
